dict.string: on alfred_script(query) set jira to "./jira.sh " set growlTitle to "JIRAlfred" set errorTitle to "JIRAlfred Error" # Command Hashes set logWork to {"l", "log", "work"} set comment to {"c", "comment"} set h to {"help", "?"} set theWords to my split(item 1 of query, space) set command to item 1 of theWords # Comment on an issue. # Usage: jira comment ISSUE-4 my comment if command is in comment then try set issueKey to item 2 of theWords set comment to my join(the rest of theWords, space) set scriptResult to do shell script jira & "--action addComment --issue " & issueKey & " --comment " & quote & comment & quote on error errMsg set scriptResult to "Error: " & errMsg end try if scriptResult contains "error" then set theTitle to errorTitle else set theTitle to growlTitle & space & issueKey end if my growl(theTitle, scriptResult) # Log work on an issue. # Usage: log TROMMELEVENTS-4 my comment #3h 40" else if command is in logWork then try set hashSplit to my split(item 1 of query, "#") set issueComment to my split(item 1 of hashSplit, space) set timeSpent to item 2 of hashSplit set cmd to item 1 of issueComment set issueKey to item 2 of issueComment set comment to my join(the rest of issueComment, space) set logWorkScript to jira & " --action addWork --issue " & issueKey & " --timeSpent " & quote & timeSpent & quote & " --comment " & quote & comment & quote set scriptResult to do shell script logWorkScript on error errMsg set scriptResult to "Error: " & errMsg end try if scriptResult contains "error" then set theTitle to errorTitle else set theTitle to growlTitle end if my growl(theTitle, scriptResult) # Help else if command is in h then open location "https://github.com/devault-gmbh/JIRAlfred/blob/master/README.md" else my growl(growlTitle, "Say what? I didn't got that command!") end if end alfred_script # Helpers on growl(theTitle, theDescription) tell application "System Events" to set GrowlRunning to exists application process "GrowlHelperApp" if GrowlRunning then tell application "GrowlHelperApp" set the allNotificationsList to {"AlfredExt-Jira"} set the enabledNotificationsList to {"AlfredExt-Jira"} register as application ¬ "AlfredExt-Jira" all notifications allNotificationsList ¬ default notifications enabledNotificationsList ¬ icon of application "Alfred" notify with name ¬ "AlfredExt-Jira" title ¬ theTitle description ¬ theDescription application name "AlfredExt-Jira" end tell end if end growl to join(aList, delimiter) set retVal to "" set prevDelimiter to AppleScript's text item delimiters set AppleScript's text item delimiters to delimiter set retVal to aList as string set AppleScript's text item delimiters to prevDelimiter return retVal end join to split(aString, delimiter) set retVal to {} set prevDelimiter to AppleScript's text item delimiters log delimiter set AppleScript's text item delimiters to {delimiter} set retVal to every text item of aString set AppleScript's text item delimiters to prevDelimiter return retVal end split to trim(someText) repeat until someText does not start with " " set someText to text 2 thru -1 of someText end repeat repeat until someText does not end with " " set someText to text 1 thru -2 of someText end repeat return someText end trim
